name: OpenBuild
fullText:
💎TON Dev Bootcamp is coming to Hangzhou !

Aug 3 | 🧑Devs | Offline, hands-on
Build your first Telegram Mini App & smart contract on TON @ton_blockchain  .

🎙️Speakers: Andrew C.  @andrew_c_ton  & Yuki @YukiVerse_HK from TON
